backend/main.mo: Canister implementing access-controlled product CRUD and user profile storage using Map and blob storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping branding and hero image updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file's purpose across marketing, shop, and admin product management features.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind setup defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes with global background and border styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component routing between marketing pages, product management, shop, and buy flow with state for selected product.
UI component showing login-required or access-denied cards for protected product management pages.
Marketing About section describing the business with stats and a three-column highlights grid.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Catego: Marketing section listing six product categories with icons and descriptions in a responsive grid.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Contac: Renders a contact section showing address, phone, email, hours, and call/map buttons using cards.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Footer: Displays footer with brand info, social links, quick navigation links, and store contact details.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Header: Provides a responsive header with navigation, scroll-to-section behavior, and view-switching for different app modes.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Hero.t: Shows a hero banner with background image, marketing text, and call/direction buttons.
frontend/src/components/marketing/Servic: Lists service offerings in a grid of cards with titles and descriptions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Checks whether the current authenticated identity is an admin using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity auth state, loading identities, providing login/logout, and exposing auth context.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React Query hooks for listing, fetching, creating, updating, and deleting products via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/index.css: TailwindCSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/fileToExternalBlob.ts: Converts a File into an ExternalBlob by reading it as an ArrayBuffer.
frontend/src/lib/storeAddress.ts: Stores the shop address and provides a Google Maps search URL generator.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entrypoint initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/BuyProduct.tsx: Product purchase page that loads a product, displays details, and enables phone or email ordering.
frontend/src/pages/ProductManagement.tsx: Admin interface for creating, editing, and deleting products with authentication and file uploads.
frontend/src/pages/Shop.tsx: Displays a product grid with images, descriptions, and Buy buttons using product list data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters across sessions.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, animations, and typography/container-query plugins. Extends theme with OKLCH-based colors, custom radii, shadows, fonts, and accordion animations.
